titles.title: Recognizing September 22nd, 2022, as the Order of the Sons and Daughters of Italy in America, Colombo-Stella Lodge 1149 Day.
Recognizing September 22nd, 2022, as the Order of the Sons and Daughters of Italy in America, Colombo-Stella Lodge 1149 Day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of a Sons and Daughters of Italy in America, Colombo-Stella Lodge 1149 Day.
